data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Northern, Sudan.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Northern, Sudan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Northern an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 3,227 believers in Northern, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Northern, Sudan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Baygo people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Northern, Sudan to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Northern. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.section_summary:
the state of Northern, Sudan has a population of 833,700.

We estimate Northern has 3,227 people who might know Jesus, 38,335 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 792,138 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 258 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 3,227 believers in the state of Northern to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

location.name: Northern
location.cities_list: Kuraymah, Dongola, Ad Dabbah, Merowe, Argo
location.cities_list_w_pop: Kuraymah (19,593), Dongola (13,473), Ad Dabbah (11,626), Merowe (10,234), Argo (7,716)
